jobs.title: AIML Intern
jobs.shortDescription: Work on cutting-edge AI/ML projects and research with hands-on experience in machine learning, deep learning, and LLMs.
jobs.description: Thank you for your interest in the AI/ML Internship role at Trizen Ventures LLP! We are looking for dedicated and passionate individuals to work on cutting-edge projects in Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and related domains. This is a full-time, hybrid, 6 months paid internship opportunity with possible PPO conversion after internship. Please ensure you fill out this application form accurately. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. To learn more about our company, visit our website: www.trizenventures.com
requirements: Knowledge of Machine Learning (ML) and Deep Learning (DL) algorithms
Experience with Large Language Models (LLMs) and their applications
Proficiency in Python and its libraries/frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, NumPy, Pandas)
Research and academic writing skills, including experience in paper publishing
Familiarity with the latest AI tools and technologies
Dedication to full-time hybrid work
responsibilities: Work on cutting-edge AI/ML projects and research
Develop and implement machine learning models
Research and experiment with Large Language Models
Contribute to academic writing and paper publishing
Collaborate with the team on innovative AI solutions
Stay updated with the latest AI tools and technologies
benefits: 6 months paid internship with competitive compensation
Hands-on experience with cutting-edge AI/ML technologies
Opportunity to work on real-world projects
selectionProcess: Candidates will have 2 rounds of selection
Assignment round and upon selecting from that round an Interview round

jobs.title: Social Media Management Intern (Hybrid)
jobs.shortDescription: Create engaging content and assist with social media campaigns to build our brand presence across multiple platforms.
jobs.description: We are looking for a creative and enthusiastic Social Media Intern to support our marketing team in managing our company's social media presence. The role involves creating engaging content, assisting with social media campaigns, and helping build our brand presence across multiple platforms. This is a hybrid internship with opportunities to learn, grow, and gain hands-on experience in digital marketing and brand management. To learn more about our company, visit our website: www.trizenventures.com
requirements: Passion for social media and digital marketing
Basic knowledge of social media platforms (LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter)
Good communication and writing skills
Creative mindset and willingness to learn
Familiarity with design tools like Canva or Adobe Creative Suite (a plus)
Interest in technology or AI/ML industry trends is an advantage
responsibilities: Assist in developing and executing social media strategies
Create and schedule posts, graphics, and videos for different platforms
Engage with followers by responding to comments and messages
Help monitor analytics and prepare simple reports on performance
Research trends and suggest creative content ideas
Collaborate with the marketing team to support campaign goals
benefits: Opportunity to shape our brand voice
Guidance and mentorship from experienced professionals
Competitive internship stipend and benefits package
Opportunity for full-time employment based on performance
selectionProcess: Round 1: Assignment (content or social media task)
Round 2: Interview with the marketing team
